snippet: A book about self-image, another about diet and one about habits do not follow the usual self-help path.
abstract: Liesl Schillinger reviews books The Beauty Experiment: How I Skipped Lipstick, Ditched Fashion, Faced the World Without Concealer, and Learned to Love the Real Me by Phoebe Baker Hyde, Wheat Belly Cookbook: 150 Recipes to Help You Lose the Wheat, Lose the Weight, and Find Your Path Back to Health by William Davis and Making Habits, Breaking Habits: Why We Do Things, Why We Don’t, and How to Make Any Change Stick by Jeremy Dean.
lead_paragraph: A book about self-image, another about diet and one about habits do not follow the usual self-help path.

headline.seo: Three Books on Becoming a Better You — Books of Style
headline.main: Uncommon Advice for Seeking a Fresh Start
headline.print_headline: Uncommon Advice for Seeking a Fresh Start
